name: ShellZone Multi-Vehicle Antifreeze/Coolant

globalDocs.name: ShellZone Multi-Vehicle Antifreeze/Coolant (2021) EN TDG V1.0 10-Mar-2021

localDocs.name: ShellZone Multi-Vehicle Antifreeze/Coolant (2021) United States EN 140002686046 EHS V1.0 24-AUG-2021

marketing: ShellZone^® Multi-Vehicle Extended Life Antifreeze/Coolant is a premium quality antifreeze/coolant that has been tested to be compatible with all automotive and light duty truck antifreeze/coolant products available in the market today. When used in a flush and refill service of the cooling system, the product will provide 5 years, or 150,000 miles of service (whichever occurs first). ShellZone^® Multi-Vehicle Extended Life Antifreeze/Coolant not only guards against freezing and boil-over, it also provides critical protection against corrosion forming on system components, including aluminium.
